languages.text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.
languages.original_text: В одном бою архмилитант может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g}, и героический акт {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдата{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran can use both the heroic act of the Veteran doctrine and the heroic act of the Fighter or Marksman doctrine in one combat.
The Veteran can use both the heroic act of the Veteran doctrine and the heroic act of the Fighter or Marksman doctrine in a single combat.

The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

languages.text: 在同一场战斗中，首席战士既可以使用首席战士{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，又可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}士兵{/g}职业的英雄壮举。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: 在同一场战斗中，老兵既可以使用老兵{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}信条{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Career}英雄壮举{/g}，又可以使用战士或神射手信条的英雄壮举。

languages.text: El Archimilitante puede usar tanto el {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} Archimilitante como el acto heroico del arquetipo {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldado{/g} en un mismo combate.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: El Archimilitante puede usar tanto el {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} Archimilitante como el {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acto heroico{/g} del arquetipo guerrero o tirador de élite en un mismo combate.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントが1回の戦闘において、アーク・ミリタント{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と、ファイターまたは兵士による{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}英雄的行為{/g}の両方を使用することができる。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or Soldier archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: 古参（ベテラン）が1回の戦闘において、古参{g|Encyclopedia:Career}ドクトリン{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と、ファイターまたはマークスマンのドクトリンによる英雄的行為の両方を使用することができる。

languages.text: В одном бою архмилитант может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g}, и героический акт {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдата{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: В одном бою ветеран может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своей {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g}, и героический акт бойца или стрелка.
В одном бою ветеран может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своей {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g}, и героический акт бойца или стрелка.

languages.text: Der Erzmilitant kann in ein und demselben Kampf sowohl die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Erzmilitanten-{g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} als auch die Heldentat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldaten{/g}-Archetyp einsetzen.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Erzmilitant kann in ein und demselben Kampf sowohl die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} der Erzmilitanten-{g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g} als auch die {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}Heldentat{/g} der Krieger- oder Scharfschützen-Doktrin einsetzen.

languages.text: L'archimilitant peut utiliser à la fois l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} de l'archimilitant et l'acte héroïque de l'archétype du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattant{/g} ou du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldat{/g} au cours d'un même combat.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

traits.locale_text: Le Vétéran peut utiliser à la fois l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} du Vétéran et l'acte héroïque de la doctrine du Combattant ou du Tireur d'Élite au cours d'un même combat.
